title: Project Alpha
description: A web application for managing tasks and boosting productivity. I was the lead developer on this project, responsible for both front-end and back-end development.

title: Project Beta
description: An e-commerce platform with a focus on user experience and modern design. I built the entire front-end from scratch using Vue.js.

title: Project Gamma
description: A personal blog and portfolio website built with a static site generator. This project showcases my skills in web performance and SEO.
